archimate:Device.name: Clinical Tablets (CTABS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Physicians, nurses, clinical teams (Emergency Room, Surgical, Medical, Paediatric, Maternity wards) • EMR/EHR access, patient rounds, real-time documentation, medication administration, telemedicine, patient monitoring dashboards.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: Intel Core i7 or equivalent ARM-based (e.g., Qualcomm Snapdragon 7c or higher) • Memory Capacity: 16 GB RAM • Storage Capacity: 256 GB SSD storage • Display Size and Resolution: 12 inches, Full HD (1920x1080) or higher, IPS touchscreen with anti-glare coating • Battery Life: Minimum 10–12 hours continuous use per charge • Operating System: Windows 11 Pro (healthcare configuration) • Connectivity Options: Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points), Bluetooth 5.1 or higher, cellular (4G LTE/5G) • Weight and Dimensions: Lightweight (< 2 lbs), compact form (approx. 11"x8"x0.5") for easy carrying during rounds • Input Options: Touchscreen (multi-touch), stylus pen (medical-grade, disinfectable) • Camera Specifications: Front-facing (minimum 5 MP) and rear camera (8 MP+) for patient assessment documentation, secure telemedicine video calls • Accessories: Keyboard and mouse • Protective Equipment: Medical-grade antimicrobial casing, rugged bumper case, reinforced screen protector. Cases must have stands.
